JGNsc framework -- MCMC continuize function

JGNsc.zip.Rd

JGNsc framework -- MCMC continuize function

JGNsc.zip(
  y,
  stepsize = 0.5,
  warm = 500,
  iter = 5000,
  min.cell = 1,
  a1 = 0.001,
  a2 = 0.001,
  b1 = 1e+08,
  b2 = 1e+08,
  a3 = 2.5,
  b3 = 1,
  c0 = 0
)

Arguments

y

matrix. dim: genes by samples
stepsize

the stepsize for the random proposal, default is 0.5
warm

the number of warm steps in the MCMC procedure
iter

the number of iterations in the MCMC procedure
min.cell

the min number of cells that should a gene should express
a1

the initial value of the parameter from the alpha parameter distribution: alpha ~ Gamma(a1,b1)
a2

the initial value of the parameter from the beta parameter distribution: beta ~ Gamma(a2,b2)
b1

the initial value of the parameter from the alpha parameter distribution: alpha ~ Gamma(a1,b1)
b2

the initial value of the parameter from the beta parameter distribution: beta ~ Gamma(a2,b2)
a3

the initial value of the parameter from the (non-dropout) p parameter distribution: p ~ Beta(a3,b3)
b3

the initial value of the parameter from the (non-dropout) p parameter distribution: p ~ Beta(a3,b3)
c0

a constant number close to zero, for the dropout case, theta value is imputed as c0 first.

Value

y.cont: imputed and continuized count matrix

keep.gene: genes kept

Contents
